response.original_title: 警察故事 III：超級警察
response.overview: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.
response.tagline: There's never a cop around when you need one, but when this cop's around, all you need is one.
response.title: Police Story 3: Super Cop
